subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which historical fort is located in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में किस इतिहासिक हितवर्ग है।
explanation_en: Umaid Bhawan Palace is a famous historical building located in Jodhpur, Rajasthan. It is not a fort but a palace used by the former royal family of Jodhpur.
explanation_hi: उमाईद भवन पाल राजगंधर का अभिमानी भवन है। यह राजगंधर में होता है, राजगंधर का अभिमानी भवन है।
question_en: Which famous palace is located in Jodhpur, Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजगंधर, राजगंधर के प्रमोहन का अभिमानी भवन है।

topic_hi.subject: Rajasthan History
topic_hi.question_en: Which palace is considered a symbol of Rajasthan's glory?
topic_hi.explanation_en: Hawa Mahal is a famous palace in Jaipur that represents the architectural heritage of Rajasthan.
topic_hi.explanation_hi: हावा महाल मैंगेंट सोट की मैंगेंट सोट की विभिल महाल की विभिल महाल
हावा महाल मैंगेंट सोट की विभिल महाल
topic_hi.question_en: Which palace is known for its beautiful architecture?
topic_hi.question_hi: विभिल महाल की ज्ञाना की क्याशा
topic_hi.explanation_en: Hawa Mahal, also known as Pratap Vilas Palace, is a beautiful palace famous for its intricate architecture.
topic_hi.explanation_hi: हावा महाल, भीमेंतापे विलास पालाइसेंतापे विलास पालाइस
topic_hi.question_en: Which palace is known for its beautiful architecture?
topic_hi.question_hi: विलास पालाइसेंतापे विलास पालाइसेंतापिसेंतापे विलास पालाइसेंतापे विलास पालाइस
topic_hi.explanation_en: Pratap Vilas Palace is a famous palace in Jodhpur, Rajasthan, renowned for its beautiful architecture. It was built by Maharaja Umed Singh of Kishanpur.
topic_hi.question_en: Which palace was built by Maharaja Umed Singh in Jodhpur, Rajasthan?
topic_hi.explanation_en: Pratap Vilas Palace is a beautiful palace built by Maharaja Umed Singh in Jodhpur, Rajasthan. The palace is famous for its intricate carvings and architecture.
topic_hi.question_en: Which palace is famous for its intricate carvings and architecture?
